help-file.title: SHIP_CREWS
help-file.content:
In Sarmiz'Duul, you will find a pub that has several crews for hire.
Syntax: hire <number> <sail/gun>
-==Sail Crews==- Standard Crew Repair Rating:20 Cost: Free (starting crew) Veteran Crew Repair Rating:30 Cost: 2000 platinum Elite Crew Repair Rating:40 Cost: 5000 platinum Repair Crew Repair Rating:70 Cost: 750 platinum -==Gun Crews==- Standard Crew Stamina:70 Cost: Free (starting crew) Veteran Archers Stamina:100 Cost: 2000 platinum Elite Catapult Crew Stamina:130 Cost: 5000 platinum Stamina Crew Stamina:200 Cost: 750 platinum
Veteran crews (of both types) require 500 ship frags to purchase. Elite crews require 1000 ship frags to purchase.
It is rumored that an expert machinist has perfected the construction of Automoton crews, but most believe this to be just a rumor. Under the remote possibility it were true, it would require an INSANE number of ship frags for him to even consider selling you the crews.
Each crew has an experience level that looks like this: 5/10 The lower number is how much exp your crew currently has, and the higher number is the max exp that crew can achieve.
If your ship frags drops below the amount needed to purchase that crew you will lose that crew.
At the moment, experience is a reflection of your ship frags: 200 ship frags = 2 experience. 500 ship frags = 5 experience.
